Reviews.Title: Good camera, great value
Reviews.Author: Felix ALVARENGA "FRAC"
Reviews.Content: I expected less quality from a camera for this price.  the equipment looks good and the quality of the image is great for the price.  It works great in our small business and I am hooking it up to an SVAT CV501 DVR System.  I am happy with the purchase and I recommend it.  Not to mention Shoptronics sent the item very fast and it was delivered in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The installation is easy and it works extremely well.  The default setup with the main system is good enough to start seeing things immediately.  I did change them, which is very easy using the mouse AND remote, to suit my specific needs.  The only thing I would suggest is for them to offer a "paint-primed" housing to let us change the color to disguise it more in certain situations.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: william carico
Reviews.Content: great camera for anyone!! works great real clear picture!! very nice camera at a very good price and really easy to setup

ProductInfo.Features:
Do-it-yourself video surveillance camera that can be set up in minutes; Easy to install with standard RCA video connection
Hi-res CCD camera with 420 TV lines of resolution; 12 infrared LEDs provide night vision up to 15 feet away
Automatic night vision control activates the IR LEDs when it gets dark; Wall, ceiling or table top mountable with extremely flexible bracket
Professional weatherproof/rust proof housing with sunshade; Weather resistant for all cold/wet/hot/dry seasons
60 feet of cable included for greater camera placement flexibility; Connects easily to any surveillance system, TV, VCR, computer or DVR for viewing/recording
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT VU301-C High Resolution Weatherproof Indoor/Outdoor Night Vision Color Surveillance CCD Security Camera
